nodes.text: Vorn's junk shop was a junk shop in the city of Mos Shuuta on Tatooine. A group of individuals on the run from the Hutt crime lord Teemo sought to obtain an hypermatter reactor igniter that Tel-Ovis promised for Trex, in order to take the bounty hunter's freighter, Krayt Fang, for themselves to get off-planet.
